name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic Vol. 11 TP
description: Rainbow Dash travels to a remote and dangerous location and finds her fellow Wonderbolt, Soarin, is about to undertake a dangerous mission. Will Dash be able to get over her ego help her fellow Pegasus?

name: Nailbiter #28
description: The new Murder Store is having a grand reopening in Buckaroo! But a returning serial killer has other plans…

name: Naruto Vol. 17 TP

description: Award-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis transforms Earth's Mightiest Heroes! But before he can build his New Avengers, he must disassemble the old ones! In the team's darkest day, one of their own tears them apart...

name: Powerpuff Girls Vol. 1: Homecoming TP

name: Ragnarok #11
description: Thor Odinson and the Black Elf assassin, Regn, face off against the Lord of the Dead and his draugar in the Dark Tower, the citadel of his power that stands on the edge of Hel.

name: Ragnarok #11 Subscription Variant
description: Thor Odinson and the Black Elf assassin, Regn, face off against the Lord of the Dead and his draugar in the Dark Tower, the citadel of his power that stands on the edge of Hel.

name: Rise of the Black Flame #5
description: The heroes’ search finally ends at the temple of the Black Flame cult, but they don’t arrive in time to stop what they find there.
